links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (7,-12).
formula: G.f.: -(1-5*x)/((1-3*x)*(1-4*x)). - _Bruno Berselli_, Jan 25 2011a(n) = 7*a(n-1)-12*a(n-2) for n>1. - _Bruno Berselli_, Jan 25 2011
mathematica: Table[4^n - 2 3^n, {n, 0, 30}] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[-(1 - 5 x) / ((1 - 3 x) (1 - 4 x)), {x, 0, 40}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 20 2013 *)
